name: Peter Chernin
overview: Peter Chernin is the co-founder and Chairman of CA Media. He is founder of The Chernin Group and Chernin Entertainment. The Chernin Group manages, operates, and invests in businesses in the media, entertainment, and technology sectors. Chernin Entertainment produces feature films and television programs. Chernin previously served as President and Chief Operating Officer of News Corporation, and Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of the Fox Group.
